headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Declasse Granger 3600LX
content:
The overachieving child of the stalwart Granger, the 3600LX proves once again that large means in charge, and anyone who says otherwise can expect 5,500 lb of steel straight to the forehead.

Purchase a stock variant of the Declasse Granger 3600LX from Southern San Andreas Super Autos and install bespoke modifications — such as the Missile Lock-on Jammer — at the Agency Vehicle Workshop.
